title: How We Got Here # 11 - The Aughts: The Decade Without A Name (Wars, Divas, Fantasy, Conspiracies)
description:
On September 11th Harry and Frodo started their trip to the Middle East where they met a famous courtesan in a Hostel. They've posted photos on MySpace with their new iPhones. But they aren't very nice to look at. 

So have we finally arrived at the 21 Century? It's time to dive into the morass of the first decade of the new millennium. There were wars, attacks, extremities, conspiracies, seductions and fantasy. Welcome to How We Got Here #11 - The Aughts: The Decade Without A Name.

Sections:
00:00 - Preview

01:50 - Introduction

08:00 - What Happened On January 1st 2000?
22:15 - September 11th 2001: The Day The Decade Started
29:50 - The War On Terror and Its Response
33:45 - Middle Eastern Wars 
39:30 - Submitting To Technology
01:07:40 - The Extremities Of Horror
01:20:15 - Diva Pop (Hetairai)
01:44:00 - Intermission
01:46:05 - Fantasy Geekdoms 
02:04:40 - The Con In Conspiracy
02:25:40 - The 2008 Financial Crisis
02:30:15 - Obama: Hope And Change?
02:37:10 - Anonymous & Wikileaks
02:45:50 - 2011: Osama Bin Laden Assassinated / The Arab Spring / Occupy Wall Street
02:51:20 - Conclusions (Foreshadowing The Teens)
